titleStmt.title: By vertue of instructions received from the right Honourable the Councel of State, dated the 7th. of August, 1650. We of the Committee of the militia of London, whose names are subscribed, do give licence unto [blank] of the parish of [blank] to stay in the Common-wealth of England ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Committee for the Militia.

notesStmt.note: Title from opening lines of text.
